landing.bio: I am a Front End Developer with a solid sense of design. I have an experience in UI/UX design as well. I really like to create things which people like to use it.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for creating websites and landing pages using HTML, CSS, JS, Bootstrap, React
Design and Development of Websites, learning UI/UX design

experience.organization: The Foundation of the First President
experience.aboutWork: Design and Developing of Website and defining strategy of development via web environment. Maintenance of website including adding and improving UI components.

Developed and designed two websites: Z Community (primary corporate website) and Z Camp (secondary website for summer education for teenagers), overlooked company management activities, add actual changes.

education.faculty: Management and Economics in Transport and Telecommunication

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I like go hiking. During the warmer months here in Prague, I enjoy swimming and playing outdoor sport
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies (as Marvel comic or Dark) and television shows (basically Late night shows), and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

awards.awardDetail: 3rd place Awards.kz - National internet award: Website about upbringing, education and science Novacity.kz
